reviewText:
Lovingly made Classic Doctor Who DVD box set containing the following sixth Doctor episodes:

- The two Doctors
- Timelash
- Revelation of the Daleks

Sound: English and German
Subtitles: English and German
Region code: ALL

In addition this set has the complete bonus material (and yes, that includes Jim'll fix it) plus a new exclusive Easter egg. Also, there is a lovely booklet (in German obviously) BUT Nicola Bryant was so kind to write a lovely introduction to the box set ... and her text is included in both languages (English and German).
